title: 0A simple way to create horizontal page view controllers infinite pages
Let’s create a new project, I’m choosing Single View Application for better demonstration

inline_content.Text: Let’s create a new project, I’m choosing Single View Application for better demonstration

title: Drag a page view controller to the storyboard, there are 2 things you should change after that:

inline_content.Text: Drag a page view controller to the storyboard, there are 2 things you should change after that:

title:
1. Set the page view controller as initial view controller
2. Change the transition style to scroll

content_resolved.code:
1. Set the page view controller as initial view controller
2. Change the transition style to scroll

title: And you need to create a UIPageViewController class, then set it as custom class of the page view controller on the storyboard

inline_content.Text: And you need to create a UIPageViewController class, then set it as custom class of the page view controller on the storyboard

title: Paste this code into your UIPageViewController class, you should get a colorful infinite paged app :)

inline_content.Text: Paste this code into your UIPageViewController class, you should get a colorful infinite paged app :)

title: This is what the final project looks like, you get a view controller with different color with every scroll:
